titles.title: National POW/MIA Remembrance Act of 2015
A bill to direct the Architect of the Capitol to place in the United States Capitol a chair honoring American Prisoners of War/Missing in Action.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
3/26/2015--Introduced. National POW/MIA Remembrance Act of 2015
Directs the Architect of the Capitol to: (1) enter into an agreement to obtain a chair featuring the logo of the National League of POW/MIA Families, and (2) place it in the U.S. Capitol in a suitable permanent location within two years after enactment of this Act.
